page.title: 04Industry.
page.content: Included in our block is a family run bakery, it is one of the very few buisnesses.They make many different types of bread using white, brown and stone ground flour.They slice their own bread which now makes up a quarter of their sales and is increasing.Their flour comes by bulk tanker from Bristol, and they use 1.5 tons a week.They employ eight people and intend expanding soon.When the bakery first began a loaf was one and a half pence it now costs 50p. They have three ovens and use coke, electricity and oil for fuel, they have two machines for mixing the dough.The buisness first began in 1947 and has moved premasis once.They begin work at midnight and work six days a week.They make bread rolls and sticks and buns which they sell to shops, hotels and door to door.
